## fetchAndFilterUtxos() function

Fetches the necessary UTXOs and filters them to get the output index and BTC transaction ID.

**Signature:**

```typescript
fetchAndFilterUtxos: (btcAccount: string, filterUtxo: (utxos: BtcApiUtxo[]) => Promise<{
    outIndex: number;
    btcTxId: string;
}>, btcService: BtcAssetsApi) => Promise<{
    outIndex: number;
    btcTxId: string;
}>
```
